page.htmlTitle: SF Asian Fine Dining - Monday, January 19, 2026
page.name: Asian Restaurant Recommendations

sidebar.title: Asian Restaurant Recommendations
sidebar.description: All Michelin-recognized Asian restaurants in SF Bay Area, with Korean, Japanese, and Chinese highlighted.
sidebar.noteHtml: How to use: Fully visible cards are our top picks for Monday‚ÄîKorean, Japanese, and Chinese restaurants open that day. Collapsed (grayed-out) cards are either closed Monday or other Asian cuisines. Click any collapsed card to expand it. Look for green Available: Mon chips.

restaurants.name: Dumpling Home
restaurants.description: Best xiao long bao in the city. 379 Hayes St, Hayes Valley.

restaurants.name: Izakaya Rintaro
restaurants.description: High-end izakaya with handcrafted interior. 282 14th St, Mission.

restaurants.name: New Dumpling
restaurants.description: Bib Gourmand dumplings in El Cerrito.

restaurants.name: Yank Sing
restaurants.description: Classic dim sum with Bib Gourmand recognition.

restaurants.name: Top Hatters Kitchen
restaurants.description: Bib Gourmand contemporary restaurant. San Leandro.

restaurants.name: Niku Steakhouse
restaurants.description: A5 Japanese Wagyu, dry-aged beef. 61 Division St, Design District.

restaurants.name: Omakase
restaurants.description: Intimate 12-seat Edomae-style omakase. 665 Townsend St, SOMA.

restaurants.name: Kin Khao
restaurants.description: Bold Thai flavors. 55 Cyril Magnin St, Union Square.

restaurants.name: Shizen
restaurants.description: Michelin Guide listed vegan Japanese sushi.

restaurants.name: Ozumo
restaurants.description: Japanese robata and sushi. 161 Steuart St, Embarcadero.

restaurants.name: Nari
restaurants.description: Chef Pim's refined Thai cuisine. 1625 Post St, Japantown.

restaurants.name: Chƒ´sai Sushi Club
restaurants.description: $95 for 13-course omakase. 3369 Mission St, Bernal Heights.

restaurants.name: Brothers Korean BBQ
restaurants.description: Charcoal grills, lively atmosphere. Richmond District.

restaurants.name: Benu
restaurants.description: Three Michelin stars. Chef Corey Lee's exceptional Asian-Contemporary cuisine. 22 Hawthorne St, SOMA.

restaurants.name: Ssal
restaurants.description: Korean fine dining tasting menu. 2226 Polk St, Russian Hill.

restaurants.name: Mister Jiu's
restaurants.description: Modern Chinese-American in historic Chinatown. 28 Waverly Pl.

restaurants.name: Nisei
restaurants.description: Japanese-American heritage tasting menu. 2316 Polk St, Russian Hill.

restaurants.name: The Shota
restaurants.description: Edomae sushi with kaiseki. Temporarily closed. 115 Sansome St, FiDi.

restaurants.name: Madcap
restaurants.description: Contemporary Asian fine dining. 198 Sir Francis Drake Blvd, San Anselmo.

restaurants.name: San Ho Won
restaurants.description: Charcoal BBQ with premium Korean cuts. Open Mon & Sun 5-9:30 PM. 2170 Bryant St, Mission. Fully booked.

restaurants.name: Ken
restaurants.description: Michelin Guide listed sushi restaurant. Fully booked.

restaurants.name: Robin
restaurants.description: Omakase sushi. 620 Gough St, Hayes Valley. Fully booked.

restaurants.name: Four Kings
restaurants.description: Michelin Guide listed Chinese. Fully booked.

restaurants.name: Noodle in a Haystack
restaurants.description: Michelin Guide listed Japanese noodles. Fully booked.
